keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
map l nextTab
map h previousTab
map <c-h> moveTabLeft
map <c-l> moveTabRight
map c enterCaretMode
map <c-b> togglePinTab
unmap <c-e>
unmap <c-y>
unmap <a-p>
unmap <a-m>
map <c-m> toggleMuteTab
unmap K
unmap J
unmap gt
unmap gT
map J scrollLeft
map K scrollRight
unbind <<
unbind >>
map wao closeOtherTabs
map war closeTabsOnRight
map wal closeTabsOnLeft
